resources.string: GAME OVER. Press back button and play again!

-> There is one big monsterball in the game, which will target your finger and attack with various weapons, you have to dodge them all, and play without lifting your finger. Anything you touch, the game will be over.
-> Right now these are just circles in the game so here is the list, which circle is what:
-> Blue: bombs, Yellow: heat waves, Cyan: laser beams
I haven\'t worked on this fancy stuff, so it is temporary, don\'t mind it, just look for bugs in the gameplay. Mail me bugs, suggestions, problems: karandesai281196@gmail.com
And please use the mentioned terminology for explaining the bug, for better understanding.

Once again, these extra things other than the GameView are still untouched, and I will work on it, once the basic game play is properly set up without bugs. keep calm and play again. ;) Do mention the bugs...
Here is your score. Well done, for starters, you will need to control the force, to match the power of the Sith!
